api_list.name: /epoch_info
api_list.description: Get the epoch information, all epochs if no epoch specified

optional_parameters.name: _epoch_no
optional_parameters.description: Epoch Number to fetch details for

optional_parameters.name: _include_next_epoch
optional_parameters.description: Include information about nearing but not yet started epoch, to get access to active stake snapshot information if available

api_list.name: /asset_nft_address
api_list.description: Get the address where specified NFT currently reside on.

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: NFT Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

api_list.name: /plutus_script_list
api_list.description: List of all existing Plutus script hashes along with their creation transaction hashes

url = "https://cardanos-decentralized-api-preprod.p.rapidapi.com/plutus_script_list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cardanos-decentralized-api-preprod.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /asset_txs
api_list.description: Get the list of current or all asset transaction hashes (newest first)

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: Asset Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

optional_parameters.name: _asset_name
optional_parameters.description: Asset Name in hexadecimal format (hex), empty asset name returns royalties

optional_parameters.name: _history
optional_parameters.description: Include all historical transactions, setting to false includes only the non-empty ones

optional_parameters.name: _after_block_height
optional_parameters.description: Block height for specifying time delta

api_list.name: /policy_asset_list
api_list.description: Get the list of asset under the given policy (including balances)

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: Asset Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

fingerprint.description: The CIP14 fingerprint of the asset

api_list.name: /totals
api_list.description: Get the circulating utxo, treasury, rewards, supply and reserves in lovelace for specified epoch, all epochs if empty

optional_parameters.name: _epoch_no
optional_parameters.description: Epoch Number to fetch details for

api_list.name: /pool_updates
api_list.description: Return all pool updates for all pools or only updates for specific pool if specified

active_epoch_no.description: Epoch number in which the update becomes active

srv.description: DNS service name of the relay (nullable)

api_list.name: /asset_address_list
api_list.description: Get the list of all addresses holding a given asset (replaced by asset_addresses)

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: Asset Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

optional_parameters.name: _asset_name
optional_parameters.description: Asset Name in hexadecimal format (hex), empty asset name returns royalties

api_list.name: /policy_asset_addresses
api_list.description:
Get the list of addresses with quantity for each asset on the given policy

`Note - Due to cardano's UTxO design and usage from projects, asset to addresses map can be infinite. Thus, for a small subset of active projects with millions of transactions, these might end up with timeouts (HTTP code 504) on free layer. Such large-scale projects are free to subscribe to query layers to have a dedicated cache table for themselves served via Koios.`

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: Asset Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

api_list.name: /blocks
api_list.description: Get summarised details about all blocks (paginated - latest first)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cardanos-decentralized-api-preprod.p.rapidapi.com/blocks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cardanos-decentralized-api-preprod.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

abs_slot.description: Absolute slot number of the block

epoch_slot.description: Slot number of the block in epoch

tx_count.description: Number of transactions in the block

vrf_key.description: VRF key of the block producer

pool.description: Pool ID in bech32 format (null for pre-Shelley blocks)

op_cert_counter.description: Counter value of the operational certificate used to create this block

optional_parameters.description: Epoch Number to fetch details for

api_list.name: /asset_history
api_list.description: Get the mint/burn history of an asset

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: Asset Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

optional_parameters.name: _asset_name
optional_parameters.description: Asset Name in hexadecimal format (hex), empty asset name returns royalties

fingerprint.description: The CIP14 fingerprint of the asset

minting_txs.description: Array of all mint/burn transactions for an asset

quantity.description: Quantity minted/burned (negative numbers indicate burn transactions)

metadata.description: Array of Transaction Metadata for given transaction

allOf.description: A JSON array containing details about metadata within transaction

items.description: Latest minting transaction metadata (aligns with CIP-25)

fingerprint.description: The CIP14 fingerprint of the asset

minting_tx_hash.description: Hash of the latest mint transaction

creation_time.description: UNIX timestamp of the first asset mint

allOf.description: A JSON array containing details about metadata within transaction

api_list.name: /pool_history
api_list.description: Return information about pool stake, block and reward history in a given epoch _epoch_no (or all epochs that pool existed for, in descending order if no _epoch_no was provided)

optional_parameters.name: _epoch_no
optional_parameters.description: Epoch Number to fetch details for

epoch_no.description: Epoch for which the pool history data is shown

active_stake.description: Amount of delegated stake to this pool at the time of epoch snapshot (in lovelaces)

active_stake_pct.description: Active stake for the pool, expressed as a percentage of total active stake on network

saturation_pct.description: Saturation percentage of a pool at the time of snapshot (2 decimals)

block_cnt.description: Number of blocks pool created in that epoch

delegator_cnt.description: Number of delegators to the pool for that epoch snapshot

fixed_cost.description: Pool fixed cost per epoch (in lovelaces)

pool_fees.description: Total amount of fees earned by pool owners in that epoch (in lovelaces)

deleg_rewards.description: Total amount of rewards earned by delegators in that epoch (in lovelaces)

epoch_ros.description: Annualized ROS (return on staking) for delegators for this epoch

api_list.name: /script_redeemers
api_list.description: List of all redeemers for a given script hash

script_hash.description: Hash of Transaction for which details are being shown

tx_hash.description: Hash of Transaction containing the redeemer

tx_index.description: The index of the redeemer pointer in the transaction

unit_mem.description: The budget in Memory to run a script

unit_steps.description: The budget in Cpu steps to run a script

fee.description: The budget in fees to run a script - the fees depend on the ExUnits and the current prices

purpose.description: What kind of validation this redeemer is used for

datum_hash.description: The Hash of the Plutus Data

datum_value.description: The actual data in json format

api_list.name: /policy_asset_info
api_list.description: Get the information for all assets under the same policy

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: Asset Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

api_list.description: Get the information of an asset including first minting & token registry metadata

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: Asset Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

optional_parameters.name: _asset_name
optional_parameters.description: Asset Name in hexadecimal format (hex), empty asset name returns royalties

api_list.description: Returns Mark, Set and Go stake snapshots for the selected pool, useful for leaderlog calculation

api_list.name: /account_utxos
api_list.description: Get a list of all UTxOs for a given stake address (account)

required_parameters.name: _stake_address
required_parameters.description: Cardano staking address (reward account) in bech32 format

api_list.name: /epoch_params
api_list.description: Get the protocol parameters for specific epoch, returns information about all epochs if no epoch specified

optional_parameters.name: _epoch_no
optional_parameters.description: Epoch Number to fetch details for

min_fee_a.description: The 'a' parameter to calculate the minimum transaction fee

min_fee_b.description: The 'b' parameter to calculate the minimum transaction fee

max_bh_size.description: The maximum block header size (in bytes)

key_deposit.description: The amount (in lovelace) required for a deposit to register a stake address

pool_deposit.description: The amount (in lovelace) required for a deposit to register a stake pool

max_epoch.description: The maximum number of epochs in the future that a pool retirement is allowed to be scheduled for

optimal_pool_count.description: The optimal number of stake pools

influence.description: The pledge influence on pool rewards

decentralisation.description: The decentralisation parameter (1 fully centralised, 0 fully decentralised)

extra_entropy.description: The hash of 32-byte string of extra random-ness added into the protocol's entropy pool

min_utxo_value.description: The minimum value of a UTxO entry

nonce.description: The nonce value for this epoch

block_hash.description: The hash of the first block where these parameters are valid

price_mem.description: The per word cost of script memory usage

price_step.description: The cost of script execution step usage

max_tx_ex_mem.description: The maximum number of execution memory allowed to be used in a single transaction

max_tx_ex_steps.description: The maximum number of execution steps allowed to be used in a single transaction

max_block_ex_mem.description: The maximum number of execution memory allowed to be used in a single block

max_block_ex_steps.description: The maximum number of execution steps allowed to be used in a single block

collateral_percent.description: The percentage of the tx fee which must be provided as collateral when including non-native scripts

max_collateral_inputs.description: The maximum number of collateral inputs allowed in a transaction

api_list.name: /asset_addresses
api_list.description:
Get the list of all addresses holding a given asset

`Note - Due to cardano's UTxO design and usage from projects, asset to addresses map can be infinite. Thus, for a small subset of active projects with millions of transactions, these might end up with timeouts (HTTP code 504) on free layer. Such large-scale projects are free to subscribe to query layers to have a dedicated cache table for themselves served via Koios.`

required_parameters.name: _asset_policy
required_parameters.description: Asset Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

optional_parameters.name: _asset_name
optional_parameters.description: Asset Name in hexadecimal format (hex), empty asset name returns royalties

api_list.name: /pool_delegators
api_list.description: Return information about live delegators for a given pool.

stake_address.description: Cardano staking address (reward account) in bech32 format

active_epoch_no.description: Epoch number in which the delegation becomes active

latest_delegation_tx_hash.description: Latest transaction hash used for delegation by the account
